document.full_text: darfuri refugees have taken 12 sudanese aid workers hostage in the volatile kalma camp, a spokesman for the u.n.-african union peacekeeping mission unamid said wednesday, raising tension in strife-ridden west sudan.
document.title: darfur refugees take 12 sudan aid workers hostage
lines_and_colors: darfuri refugees have taken 12 sudanese aid workers hostage in the volatile kalma camp, a spokesman for the u.n.-african union peacekeeping mission unamid said wednesday, raising tension in strife-ridden west sudan.
